short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hide annoying posts on your Facebook news feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Facewash allows you to create a list of keywords or phrases, and automatically removes any matching posts from your news feed.

To configure:

1) After installing the extension, go to chrome://extensions.
2) Click 'options' below Facewash.
3) Enter as many keywords or phrases as you like, and click 'Save'.
